title: Matrix question auto-selects previous answer when navigating between answered and unanswered items
body:
In matrix-type questions, when navigating between questions, previously selected answers are incorrectly retained. Specifically, if a user answers one question, then navigates back to an unanswered question, and then forward again, the previously selected answer is automatically preselected for the unanswered question

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/9c3d8e37-93af-4fe5-8c7d-73601357cece

title: submissions couchdb failed updates
body: Currently getting repeated/multiple PUT requests from myPlanet on the `submissions` database that end up inflating DB size (observed growth â‰ˆ 4GB/day before manual compaction -> Clean up of conflict documents) Likely caused by requests either: - Trying to update existing docs with the `_rev` missing (existing docs with _revs already) - Trying to update the doc with an old `_rev` - Non unique id generation

title: Add new Line for multiple images on the voices
body:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/06e54508-5c00-4cd0-986a-e827eddc43df)

In the new voices before of adding the images we can add two new lines after the text for add the new resources.
